title: 7. Natural Language Processing (NLP), Part 1
description:
MIT 6.S897 Machine Learning for Healthcare, Spring 2019
Instructor: Peter Szolovits
View the complete course: https://ocw.mit.edu/6-S897S19
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP60B0PQXVQyGNdCyCTDU1Q5j

This lecture and the next covers the role of Natural Language Processing in machine learning in healthcare. In this lecture, Prof. Szolovits covers methods which are not based on neural networks representations.
